meanings.sent1: The cinematographic effects in the movie were stunning.
meanings.sent2: She studied cinematographic techniques in film school.
meanings.sent3: The cinematographic camera seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: His imagination was a cinematographic masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The cinematographic scenes painted a vivid picture for the audience.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the art or technique of making motion pictures.
meanings.sent1: The cinematographic process involves careful planning.
meanings.sent2: The director's cinematographic skills brought the story to life.
meanings.sent3: The cinematographic crew worked tirelessly to capture the perfect shot.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cinematographic studio, full of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The cinematographic magic on screen mesmerized the viewers.
